author: dspicar
msg: CLEREZZA-688: removed unnecessary dependency management section.

author: davidb
msg: Change Provide-Capability/Require-Capability model to follow latest thinking for the ServiceLoader Mediator spec.

author: jwross
msg: ARIES-825: Update subsystems to latest Subsystem, Resolver, and Repository APIs.
(1) Cleaned up some uninstall cleanup issues.
(2) Updated subsystems, resolver, and repository APIs to latest.
(3) Updated core and itests to reference new org.osgi.framework.namespace constants instead of ResourceConstants.

Note these updates will break the subsystems build for anyone who does not have access to the updated org.eclipse.equinox.coordinator and org.eclipse.osgi jars. These are not yet available in a public repository but will be soon. Please contact me if you need them (jwross@us.ibm.com).
